reviews.review: Ты собственного пистолета боишься или чё?

This is my own personal review on Counter Strike, this is not a shared review for the game. This is one of my favourite games to play with friends/by yourself. One of my favourite things about this game it has it's very own achievements system that makes you want to grind out the hours playing the game. Counter Strike has its own market place for you to splash your cash for your likeable skins to flex.
Best shooting and movement of any game I've ever played. And while quake might be debatably better, they both have god like shooting and movement.

Over 1000 hours. Was LEM. Come back to be worse than average. 10/10

For a game that has been released for over 8 years, it is really great, i don't get tired of it even if i get frustrated about the countless smurf.

You need to be patient, learn the different callouts when you play competitive and practice your aim.
It may be laggy sometimes but don't forget that it is an online game.
